name: Bundle Up and Sip Tea
description:
A submission for Mini Jam 124: Warmth (after a long time not touching Unity and do programming).

The story so far ....

A distant uncle you barely remember left a tea house in a small town in your care. His message is just "keep townsfolk warm". He didn't even remember that you, too, need to keep yourself warm to go through harsh winter (climate change sucks, man).

Hm, okay.

This game aimed to be more narrative, but the gameplay is kept as simple as possible for jam submission.

You gonna update later then?

I do want to update later. Polishing, balancing, and filling the content.

Oh, yeah, about the game page cover--

I know it's a huge mismatch. Yes, I know. Really sorry for deceiving you. The hot drink in the cover is not even tea.
